official_title: A bill to amend title 5 United States Code, to entitle civil air patrol cadets 18 years of age and older to compensation available to civil air patrol senior members in event of disability or death, and to increase the level of compensation available to both.

summary.text: Entitles Civil Air Patrol Cadets 18 years of age or older to the same compensation for disability or death which is available to Civil Air Patrol senior members. Increases the amount of such compensation available to both.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 United States Code, to entitle civil air patrol cadets 18 years of age and older to compensation available to civil air patrol senior members in event of disability or death, and to increase the level of compensation available to both.
